inclusion.criterion: neurological impairment secondary to a traumatic spinal cord injury
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: bladder management is intermittent catheterization (IC) or indwelling catheter (transurethral or suprapubic)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: urodynamic documentation of neurogenic detrusor overactivity (NDO)
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: history of uncontrolled autonomic dysreflexia or significant autonomic dysreflexia on urodynamics
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: known history or treatment for a non-neurogenic bladder or prostate problem (prostate cancer, bladder cancer)
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of CVA and neurogenic bladder with indwelling suprapubic catheter. They have had multiple prior admissions for UTIs and altered mental status.
